[i]Unified Forces[/i] – Whenever you activate an ability of Mercenary you control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Ruler of the Mercenary Kingdom[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”
